entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023
